thread.title: David Bowie exhibit ready for final stop in Brooklyn

title: David Bowie exhibit ready for final stop in Brooklyn
text:
David Bowie exhibit ready for final stop in Brooklyn 4:59am IST - 01:18 
A look inside the Brooklyn Museum for the final stop of 'David Bowie is' - a retrospective exploring five decades of the artist's career. Rough Cut (No Reporter Narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
